channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Harbin Institute of Technology (Shenzhen) on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: In-Context Learning State Vector with Inner and Momentum Optimization
item.description: This paper introduces inner and momentum optimization to enhance the state vector for in-context learning, improving performance and scalability in LLMs.

item.title: MambaSCI: Efficient Mamba-UNet for Quad-Bayer Patterned Video Snapshot Compressive Imaging
item.description: MambaSCI: Efficient, novel deep learning model reconstructs high-quality quad-Bayer video from compressed snapshots, surpassing existing methods.
